# Weapon Augmentation, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** S, M (an ointment costing 200 gp)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One weapon or fifty projectiles, all of which must be in contact with each other at the time of casting

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None (object)

**Spell Resistance:** No (object)

**Source:** Eberron Campaign Setting (WotC), pg. 117

As *[[Weapon Augmentation, Lesser (Spell)|lesser weapon augmentation]]**,* but you can choose any special ability whose market price is equivalent to a bonus of up to +5 or up to 200,000 gp, such as *[[Vorpal (MagWpnSpcAb)|vorpal]]*.
